title: Vimpire

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Suck the blood of a player at night on even numbered nights, attacking them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- For every successful kill, your Attack and Defense will increase by one tier.
- You may perform the factional kill, but it does not affect the prior attribute.
- Vampire Hunter style roles are immune to your attacks, and ignore your defense.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Consume the brains of all who oppose the Zombies.
